channel.title: DevOps on Docker Docs
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Docker Docs

item.title: Introduction to Azure Pipelines with Docker
item.description: Learn how to automate Docker image build and push using Azure Pipelines.

item.title: Building Compose projects with Bake
item.description: This guide demonstrates how you can use Bake to build production-grade images for Docker Compose projects.

item.title: Introduction to GitHub Actions with Docker
item.description: Learn how to automate image build and push with GitHub Actions.

item.title: Mastering multi-platform builds, testing, and more with Docker Buildx Bake
item.description: Learn to automate Docker builds and testing with declarative configurations using Buildx Bake.
